title: Find Mystic Carrion's Servant
content:
a fight with a lot of undead. Jar of Mystic Carrion's Brain is on a table. Jar of Mystic Carrion's Liver is in a chest next to it. Read the book called "Funerary Jar Form and Function" in this room. It gives you the clue for Jar of the heart, which is actually located within Thrumbo. Talk to Thrumbo to get the Jar of Mystic Carrion's Heart.
